title: Login issues even with new passwords set
body:
Hi!

I tried to access my old accounts. I got the email with the account names and that they are located on EU Nordic and East. 
Changed password for both of them and it seemed allright.

However, when I login at the webpage, I get the message missmatch account name/password/region.
When I login in LOL client, I get the message "Your account has been transferred to another region".

Doesn't this seem strange even when I got names, region and new passwords for my accounts?
I created a support ticket, just wanted to know if someone else experienced the issue.

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a support ticket for this issue, I recommend waiting for a specialist to reach back out to ya. We'll need to give your account a thorough investigation to figure out what's going on, so fixing this in your ticket would be the best option since you've already sent a ticket in.

If you have any other questions, let me know.

hi dude =] i think i found a solution because mine  it's ok now.. 
so , go on the gear (settngs)  and do a full repair files , and log in with your OLD password... at least this helped me.. !! :P idk.. i even changed my pw but i log in with my old xD
